text:
The law on autonomous Runet in Russia entered into force
01 Nov 2019, 08:41 by Artyom Bausov
Starting today, November 1, 2019, the law on the sovereign Internet enters into force in Russia.
The law obliges telecom operators to install technical networks to counter external threats on networks. They will allow you to filter traffic and restrict access to restricted sites.
Earlier, deputy Andrei Klishas estimated implementation costs at 20 billion rubles. According to Kommersant, the deployment of hardware will take another year.
The provisions on the national domain zone and cryptographic protection will become effective only on January 1, 2021. [Kommersant]
